text: Eliseo Francisco Mendoza Berrueto (13 April 1931 - 17 May 2022) was a Mexican politician and economist. He was the Governor of Coahuila from 1 December 1987 until 30 November 1993. He was born in San Pedro de las Colonias, Coahuila, Mexico. He was the President of the Chamber of Deputies in 1985. Mendoza Berrueto was a Deputy from 1985 until 1987.
